Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to posting financial disclosure filings for candidates for statewide elected office or candidate for a member of the legislature
Summary: Relates to the annual statement of financial disclosure and the posting of financial disclosure filings for candidates for statewide elected office or candidates for a member of the legislature.
LawCode: Amd ยง73-a, Pub Off L; amd ยง94, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law and the executive law, in relation to the annual statement of financial disclosure and the posting of financial disclosure filings for candidates for statewide elected office or candidates for a member of the legislature
